ygData.subject: Re: h2h skill cap 40 for lvl 12 HEF bard?
ygData.msgSnippet: don t know about best weapon.  depends on where your stats are i guess.  if you have high dex maybe piercing is better, if you have high strength then 1h
ygData.messageBody:
don't know about best weapon. depends on where your stats are i guess. if
you have high dex maybe piercing is better, if you have high strength then
1h slashing is best. it is always good to have your 1h slashing, 1h blunt,
and piercing maxed cause you never know when that cool weapon will come
along (i.e. fanged skull stiletto, which i heard about and am maxxing my
piercing for, and the staff of writhing, which i am maxxing my 1h blunt
for).

btw tracking is not capped at 1 or 40, mine is 90 now and seems to keep
going up.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 40 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


-----Original Message-----
From: Adam DeMarino [mailto:psycotix@...]
Sent: Sunday, May 30, 1999 4:08 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] h2h skill cap 40 for lvl 12 HEF bard?


From: Adam DeMarino <psycotix@...>

Yes, most bard skills are capped at 40. I did not know about h2h(damm
wanted to train in that too), but 2handers are capped at 1, tracking at
1, forage at 40, pick lock at 40, hide at 40, sneak at 40, disarm traps
at 40. Safe fall, instill doubt, and bind wound are probably too. Corect
me if I'm wrong. The only thing we aren't capped in are the basic weapon
skills(cept mentioned), instrument and singing skills, dual wield,
offense and defense, (though it seems to be 5 pts behind your level,
I've been at 90 forever at level 18), and language skills. Its the price
of being a bard heh. About best weapon...I personally used a dwarven axe
from 5 to well...using it now. Its got a nice 6 dam 26 delay. Very good
weapon, plus has same time between attacks as my polished granite
tomhawk, which is helpful in seeing when dual wield fails.

Talonus
Traveling Bard of Solusek Ro


chr.geo@... wrote:
>
> From: chr.geo@...
>
> I level 12 HEF - skill level is "bad", guildmaster(s) says "trained to the
> max limit" - does that mean that hand to hand skill caps at 40? Or is it
> graduated level cap, where at higher levels the cap will rise unlike the
LVL
> * 5 + 5 formula that seems to work for sense heading, swimming, 1H
slashing,
> etc ...
>
> If 40 is skill cap then I am extremely disappointed because that means
that
> I won't ever be able to be instrument wielding bard in combat ... if true,
> is it also true for human bard? I wish I would have access to this type of
> game documentation instead it's holed up inside some Verant programmer's
> skull ...
>
> And weapons is another story ... is 1H slashing capped at some point? What
> is best bard weapon ... I spent 10 practices in piercing and got giant
snake
> fang but did I just waste practices?
>
> L8
> Naum
